conclusion: Analyze the electric field and resulting force on charge q.
Electric field E between plates is uniform and given by E = V/d.
Capacitance C is related to charge Q and potential difference V by C = Q/V.
Substitute V = Q/C into E = V/d to get E = Q/(C * d).
Force F on charge q in electric field E is given by F = qE.
Substitute E = Q/(C * d) into F = qE to get F = q(Q/(C * d)).
Simplify to get F = qQ/(C * d).
